mapper.select: SELECT rno, pno, ptt, name, today, bcnt, memid, lcnt, savename FROM (SELECT rownum rno, pno, ptt, name, today, bcnt, memid, lcnt, savename FROM (SELECT p.pno, ptt, name, TO_CHAR(today, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') today, bcnt, m.memid, lcnt, savename FROM promotion p, member m, image i WHERE p.memno = m.memno AND p.isshow = 'Y' AND i.pno = p.pno ORDER BY today desc) e) ee

SELECT p.pno, ptt, pbd, name, bno, TO_CHAR(p.today, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') today, bcnt, bloc, cate, m.memid, bname, NVL(imgno, 0) imgno, NVL(oriname, 'none') oriname, NVL(savename, 'none') savename, r.rcnt, lcnt FROM promotion p, image i, member m, (SELECT COUNT(*) rcnt FROM (SELECT * FROM review) WHERE isshow = 'Y' AND pno = #{pno}) r WHERE p.pno = i.pno(+) AND p.memno = m.memno(+) AND p.isshow = 'Y' AND p.pno = #{pno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO promotion(pno, ptt, bno, pbd, cate) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(pno)+1, 1000) FROM promotion), #{ptt}, (SELECT bno FROM member m WHERE AND memid = #{memid}), #{pbd}, #{cate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE promotion SET pshow = 'N' WHERE pno = #{pno}
UPDATE promotion SET ptt = #{ptt}, pbd = #{pbd}, cate = #{cate} WHERE pno = #{pno}
UPDATE promotion SET bcnt = bcnt + 1 WHERE pno = #{pno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(rno, pno, rtt, rbd, memno, rst) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(rno)+1, 100000) FROM review), #{pno}, #{rtt}, #{rbd}, (SELECT memno FROM member WHERE memid = #{memid}), #{rst} )
mapper.select: SELECT ee.rrno, rno,name, memid, ptt, rtt, rbd, memno, rst, today, pno, savename FROM (SELECT rownum rrno,rno, name, m.memid, ptt, rtt, rbd, m.memno, e.today, rst, pno, savename FROM (SELECT p.pno, ptt, bno, pbd, TO_CHAR(r.today, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') today, bcnt, pshow, cate, r.rno, rtt, rbd, memno, rst, rshow, savename FROM PROMOTION p, REVIEW r, image i WHERE rshow = 'Y' AND i.rno = r.rno AND p.pno = r.pno AND p.pno = #{pno} ) e, member m WHERE m.memno = e.memno ORDER BY today ) ee
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET rshow = 'N' WHERE rno = #{rno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO image(imgno, oriname, savename, pno) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(imgno)+1, 10000000) FROM image), #{oriname}, #{savename}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(pno), 10000000) FROM promotion) )
INSERT INTO image(imgno, oriname, savename, rno) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(imgno)+1, 10000000) FROM image), #{oriname}, #{savename}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(rno), 100000) FROM review) )
